text:
Moz - Seattle, WA

We're looking for a senior software engineer to join our Moz Local team, building web apps using mainly Node.js, Backbone.js and CoffeeScript.

We have a great office location and (literally) award-winning perks and benefits.

Check out the details here: http://moz.theresumator.com/apply/WRUiPP?source=Moz

We have a few other open positions listed here: http://moz.com/about/jobs
